page.title: 14JOBS
page.content: THE POSTMAN Our school postman delivers twice a day Monday to Friday,once on Saturdays and not at all on Sunday.His name is Brian Grant,he delivers on average 800 letters a day.He has another duty which is sorting out the letters.His area of delivery covers the Old Town area covering Waterside and our school area. THE MILK MAN The Milk Man comes round on his float at around 7.15 am.He gives us our milk and then drives on down the street.The float is electrically powered and runs on batteries.It has a cab at the front where the milkman sits.The rest of the space is taken up by a covered compartment for carrying the milk crates.Some milkmen also sell cream,eggs,yoghurt,and bread.Every Friday he collects the money.
